examples.text: a remark that might warrant a good smack in the snoot

definitions: a person who shows contempt for those considered to be of a lower social class

examples.text: the snoots complain that the paper has lowered its standards

shortDefinitions: person who shows contempt for those considered to be of lower social class

definitions: a tubular or conical attachment used to produce a narrow beam from a spotlight

examples.text: a small flash unit was fitted with a snoot

shortDefinitions: tubular or conical attachment used to produce narrow beam from spotlight
